name: INKHEART (itch)
description:
You are left alone. Forgotten. Get back what he stole from you. But be warned. You'll have to make some sacrifices first.

Heya! This game was made for the Pirate Software game jam, where the theme was Sacrifice is Strength, so due to this theme, you'll now be able to buy attacks and items but by sacrifcing your hearts, so be careful with your health. The game is black and white, strictly because of the 2 bit color restriction.

The goal of the game? For right now, just try to survive the pit.

Read the READ ME for controls

A lot of planned content was sadly cut so all we have is a singular room with no music and sound effects.

This game was made using Game Maker Studio 2 and Aseprite

Art and Coding was made by vide0gamer (me)

(hey!this is my first ever published game , give us some feedback on how to make this play better!)

Hope you enjoy!
